section.title: Overview
section.para:
This module implements TLS operations using the
openSSL libarary. It provides the primitives required by the tls_mgm module in order to expose a higher-level API used by TLS-based protocol modules like proto_tls or proto_wss etc.

section.title: &osips; Modules
section.para:
The following modules must be loaded before this module:
None.

section.title: External Libraries or Applications
section.para:
&osips; TLS v1.0 support requires the following packages:
openssl or libssl >= 0.9.6
openssl-dev or libssl-dev

&osips; TLS v1.1/1.2 support requires the following packages:
openssl or libssl >= 1.0.1e
openssl-dev or libssl-dev
